title: Lawful Lover
description: After their tumultuous beginnings, Sabrina moves in with Daniel in New York, leaving her life in San Francisco behind. But not all is rosy for the new couple, who’s known each other for barely two weeks and is having a hard time adjusting to living together.Dark clouds appear on the horizon as an old nemesis from San Francisco causes trouble for Daniel, while Daniel’s ex-girlfriend Audrey resorts to deception to make Sabrina doubt Daniel’s love for her.NOTE: Enticing was previously published under the title Lawful Lover.
author: Tina Folsom
